original_title: Toujours A L'avant - Garde De L'avant - Garde Jusqu'Au Paradis Et Au-Dela
overview: This film is a supertemporal oeuvre. The support of the audience's participations is constitued by an image, which has varied several times during the course of many a projection. A projection by Maurice Lemaître, himself, in the soundtrack, clarifies the function of the session and finishes on a challenge thrown to the room.
title: Ever the Avant-Garde of the Avant-Garde till Heaven and After
